div.div:
feat(misc): housecleaning, linting, & fixing react jsx
* Updated `tsconfig.json` file to extend astro base & "fix" react * Reinstalled `@tailwindcss/typography` as a dev dep as it is necessary to format my blog post as an actual article/medium * Moved build-time pkgs not required at runtime to devDependencies * Various maintain tasks such as linting, reusability via `Icon` component(s), exporting more global consts, and modifying daisyui / css classes to improve aesthetics/appearance/feel

refactor(deps): bump `daisyui@5.x` + upgrade/migrate `tailwind@4.x`
* Run npm-check-updates `ncu` to bump deps (not `astro`/`tailwind`) * Ran `npx @astrojs/upgrade` && `@npx @tailwindcss/upgrade` cmds to bump astro & install @tailwindcss + peripheral pkgs (vite, etc)
Removed the @astrojs/tailwind pkg as it depends on tailwind v3 and updated `astro.config.mjs` accordingly to configure `tailwindcss` as a vite build plugin. Tailwind v4 is imported solely in a global `.css` file which should then be imported in a base/shared layout file to apply its styles across all relevant pages or components.
`daisyui` is also imported/configured as a plugin in the same `css` file so I've migrated both pkgs accordingly then removed the old- style `tailwind.config.cjs` file. Also updated a few css classes as bumping from 2.x->5.x entailed a number of (breaking) changes.
Merged #4 Migrate all (dev) deps to @latest versions & continued cleanup / modularization

feat(misc): housecleaning, linting, & fixing react jsx
* Updated `tsconfig.json` file to extend astro base & "fix" react * Reinstalled `@tailwindcss/typography` as a dev dep as it is necessary to format my blog post as an actual article/medium * Moved build-time pkgs not required at runtime to devDependencies * Various maintain tasks such as linting, reusability via `Icon` component(s), exporting more global consts, and modifying daisyui / css classes to improve aesthetics/appearance/feel
Opened #4 Migrate all (dev) deps to @latest versions & continued cleanup / modularization

footer.span: Last updated 22 Jun 2025, 18:08:54 (timezone America/Los_Angeles) with lowlighter/metrics@3.34.0
